name: SmartHealthTracker-YourDailyHealthJournal
0:
”Alexa open Health Journal”
”Alexa launch Health Journal”
”Alexa, ask Health Journal send weekly report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: health journal
des:
Keeping a journal of your health has never been easier. Smart Health Tracker -> your Health, every day!

Who does not want to live a healthy life?

Everyone does!

But how do you ensure that you are all fit and fine and living a life free of any dangerous medical condition? Especially when you are so busy running around in a hurry trying to check all the boxes in your to-do list for the day, which of course, keeps repeating in its endless cycle. 

So what’s the alternative?

Smart Health Tracker (INVOKE -> TRACK -> SHARE)

Health parameters:
Record and manage your daily health parameters like Blood pressure, Blood Sugar, Temperature, Oxygen, Heartrate, Weight to attain and lead a healthy lifestyle.
You will get suggestions or warnings based on the value of your Health parameters.

Health report:
Get your Health report via email and share health reports with Doctors and physicians. 
To get the report via email, just say, "Send me weekly report"

How to use:
When you enable the skill, you will be asked to log in using your Amazon Account to ensure data accuracy.
Once, account linking is done, you can immediately start adding your health parameters.

Commands to try:
"Alexa, open Health Journal" OR
"Alexa, ask Health Journal my oxygen is 99" OR
"Alexa, ask Health Journal my blood sugar is 80" OR
"Alexa, ask Health Journal my temperature is 101.20" OR
"Alexa, ask Health Journal send me weekly report" 

Disclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
